summary: This document is an email chain from August 1, 2019, regarding a request for medical notes on Jeffrey Epstein following a reported suicide attempt. The request is made to the Chief Psychologist at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York and highlights internal communication about Epstein's condition shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email request; the individual for whom medical notes regarding a suicide attempt are being sought.

events.title: Request for Epstein's Medical Notes
events.description: An email request is sent asking for notes on Jeffrey Epstein regarding his suicide attempt.

events.title: Follow-up on Medical Notes Request
events.description: A follow-up email is sent stressing urgency and requesting a HIPAA authorization for the release of Epstein's medical notes.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A request for medical notes on Jeffrey Epstein's suicide attempt was made on July 31, 2019.
A follow-up email on August 1, 2019, stressed urgency and mentioned the need for a HIPAA authorization.
The correspondence involves the Chief Psychologist at the Federal Bureau of Prisons' Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
This communication occurred shortly before Epstein's death in August 2019, highlighting concerns about his mental state and institutional oversight.
